label: Streaming Devices
description: Devices and services that allow users to stream video content to their TVs.
intents: Watch TV shows and movies on TV

subcategories.label: Streaming Sticks
subcategories.description: Small devices that plug into the HDMI port of a TV and allow streaming of video content.
subtopics: Roku vs. Amazon Fire TV Stick

subcategories.label: Streaming Boxes
subcategories.description: Larger devices that connect to a TV and allow streaming of video content.

subcategories.label: Streaming Services
subcategories.description: Subscription-based services that allow streaming of video content.

subcategories.label: Live TV Streaming
subcategories.description: Services that allow streaming of live TV channels.

subcategories.label: Streaming Devices for Gaming
subcategories.description: Devices that allow streaming of video games to a TV.
